exam.question: An obvious change of attitude at the top towards women’s status in society will ______ through the current law system in Japan.

answer.explain: permeate through： 渗透到…中。句意： 上层社会对妇女社会地位的态度转变将渗透到日本现行法律制度中。probe： 探查， 查明； violate： 亵渎， 冒犯； grope： 摸索。

sentences.sContent: The smell of diesel oil permeated the air.
sentences.sCn: 空气里充斥着柴油的气味。

sentences.sContent: ...Robots are very likely to permeate much of our daily life in the coming years...

remMethod.val: per(贯穿) ＋ meat ＋ e → 贯穿进去 → 渗入

words.tran: 渗透性；透磁率，导磁系数；弥漫
渗透；[化学] 渗透作用；散布性

trans.tranCn: 弥漫， 遍布， 散布； 渗入， 渗透
trans.tranOther: if liquid, gas etc permeates something, it enters it and spreads through every part of it
